original_title: The Pineapple Thief - Give It Back
overview: Give It Back is a new album featuring 12 new versions of earlier works including songs taken from the albums Little Man, All The Wars, Tightly Unwound and more. Frontman Bruce Soord's newly recorded vocals and guitars, new Gavin Harrison drum parts, new mixing by Soord and Harrison and mastering by Steve Kitch propel this new release into a must-have that showcases the evolution of The Pineapple Thief.
title: The Pineapple Thief - Give It Back
